metadata.name: Use of OpenConsole
metadata.comment: Detects usage of OpenConsole binary as a LOLBIN to launch other binaries to bypass application Whitelisting

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('openconsole.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\openconsole.exe')) AND NOT startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\program files\\windowsapps\\microsoft.windowsterminal')))

output.summary: Detects usage of OpenConsole binary as a LOLBIN to launch other binaries to bypass application Whitelisting

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use by an administrator Reference: https://twitter.com/nas_bench/status/1537563834478645252
